alert.note: Alert for Inland Jefferson; Inland Wakulla; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 03 at 10:59AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Wakulla, west central Jefferson and eastern Leon Counties through 1145 AM EST... At 1058 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Crawfordville, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Woodville, Florida State University, Tallahassee Community College, Crawfordville, Florida A and M, Doak Campbell Stadium, Lake Bradford, Shadeville, Leon Sinks, Gaither Community Center, Wakulla Springs, Tallahassee Memorial Hosp, Walker Ford Community Center, Miccosukee, South City, Eight Mile Pond, Griffin Heights, Bethel and Tallahassee Regional A/P. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
